title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Mixing up the dynamics in relationships allows you to explore new avenues of growth. Perhaps you decide to trust and lean on a partner more than usual. Or, if youre unattached, you may go online to connect with a different network of like-minded people. The Libra New Moon activates your 7th House of Others, emboldening you to show more openness and less fear when it comes to matters of the heart. Fortunately, this positive attitude builds momentum as the day unfolds. Increasing psychic space for those you adore provides you with the opportunity to give more of yourself. What you send out comes back. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
